mapper.sql: Id, handicapId, userId, orderAmount, orderDetail, createDate
mapper.update: update Orders set handicapId = #{handicapid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderAmount = #{orderamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderDetail = #{orderdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
